name: Sky Dawgz
description:
This is an aerial dawgfighting game with WW2 Planes. Be the top dawg!

Made in 72hrs for the #indiesvspewdiepie game jam.

Link

Keyboard Controls: Arrow Keys + Spacebar

Gamepad: Left Thumbstick + A Button

Your health is shown by the type of smoke emitted from your plane.

Art/Design:

@pxlfro

Music/Sound:

Evan Witt

www.wittynotes.com

https://soundcloud.com/evan-witt/skydogz-main-titl...
